header.description: We simplify the complex China visa process with our proven 4-step approach, ensuring your application meets all Chinese immigration requirements.

consultation.title: Initial consultation and assessment
consultation.description: Our China immigration specialists evaluate your eligibility and provide detailed information about China residence permit requirements and visa options.

documentPreparation.title: Document preparation and review
documentPreparation.description: We guide you through gathering all required documents, ensuring they meet Chinese immigration standards and are properly authenticated and notarized.

applicationSubmission.title: Application submission and tracking
applicationSubmission.description: Our legal team submits your China residence permit application and provides ongoing support throughout the PSB (Public Security Bureau) processing.

permitApproval.title: Residence permit approval and registration
permitApproval.description: We assist with the final steps including medical examination, temporary residence registration, and ensure you receive your China residence permit.
